sources.title: The Promise of Love (1980) Valerie Bertinelli | Drama, Romance Full Length TV Movie
sources.description:
A woman who gave up college to marry her Marine boyfriend becomes a widow soon after her husband is sent to Vietnam.
 
Director: Don Taylor
Writers: Harry Longstreet, Renee Longstreet
Stars: Valerie Bertinelli, Jameson Parker, Andy Romano & Shelly Long
Genres: Drama, Romance
